80 void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAInit (void)
81 {
82  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex = 0;
83  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex = 0;
84 
85  /* Populate the LVDS Stream HW Session EDMA Channel Table: */
86  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_0;
87  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
88  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_1;
89  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
90  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_2;
91  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_2;
92  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[3].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_3;
93  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[3].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_3;
94  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[4].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_4;
95  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[4].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_4;
96  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[5].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_5;
97  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[5].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_5;
98  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[6].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_6;
99  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[6].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_6;
100  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[7].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_7;
101  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[7].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_7;
102  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[8].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_8;
103  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[8].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_8;
104  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[9].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_9;
105  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[9].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_9;
106  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[10].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_10;
107  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[10].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_10;
108 
109  /* Populate the LVDS Stream SW Session EDMA Channel Table: */
110  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_0;
111  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
112  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_1;
113  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
114  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_2;
115  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_2;
116 }
117 
130 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamInit (void)
131 {
132  CBUFF_InitCfg initCfg;
133  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
134  int32_t errCode;
135  Semaphore_Params semParams;
136 
137  /*************************************************************************************
138  * Open the CBUFF Driver:
139  *************************************************************************************/
140  memset ((void *)&initCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_InitCfg));
141 
142  /* Populate the configuration: */
143  initCfg.socHandle = gMmwMssMCB.socHandle;
144  initCfg.enableECC = 0U;
145  initCfg.crcEnable = 1U;
146  /* Up to 1 SW session + 1 HW session can be configured for each frame. Therefore max session is 2. */
147  initCfg.maxSessions = 2U;
148  initCfg.enableDebugMode = false;
149  initCfg.interface = CBUFF_Interface_LVDS;
150  initCfg.outputDataFmt = CBUFF_OutputDataFmt_16bit;
151  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.crcEnable = 0U;
152  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.msbFirst = 1U;
153  /* Enable all lanes available on the platform*/
154  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.lvdsLaneEnable = 0x3U;
155  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.ddrClockMode = 1U;
156  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.ddrClockModeMux = 1U;
157 
158  /* Initialize the CBUFF Driver: */
159  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle = CBUFF_init (&initCfg, &errCode);
160  if (gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle == NULL)
161  {
162  /* Error: Unable to initialize the CBUFF Driver */
163  System_printf("Error: CBUFF_init failed with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
164  goto exit;
165  }
166 
167 
168  /* User data buffer is involved in LVDS streaming.
169  * The 64 byte alignment is a speculative workaround for an issue where
170  * EDMA is not completing transfer. */
171  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.userDataHeader = Memory_alloc(NULL,
172  sizeof(MmwDemo_LVDSUserDataHeader_t),
173  64U, /* alignment */
174  NULL);
175 
176  /* Initialize the HSI Header Module: */
177  if (HSIHeader_init (&initCfg, &errCode) < 0)
178  {
179  /* Error: Unable to initialize the HSI Header Module */
180  System_printf("Error: HSIHeader_init failed with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
181  goto exit;
182  }
183 
184  /* Populate EDMA resources */
185  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAInit();
186 
187  /* Initialize semaphores */
188  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
189  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
190  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneSemHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
191  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneSemHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
192 
193  /* Check some assumptions about s/w session regarding sizes for user buffer which
194  * are going to stream out in CBUFF units so must be even number of bytes */
195  MmwDemo_debugAssert((sizeof(MmwDemo_LVDSUserDataHeader_t) & 1) == 0);
196  MmwDemo_debugAssert((sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudCartesian) & 1) == 0);
197  MmwDemo_debugAssert((sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo) & 1) == 0);
198 
199  retVal = 0;
200 
201 exit:
202  return retVal;
203 }
204 
216 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel
217 (
218  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
219  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
220 )
221 {
222  if(ptrEDMAInfo->dmaNum == 0)
223  {
224  ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0;
225  ptrEDMACfg->shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
226  }
227  else if(ptrEDMAInfo->dmaNum == 1)
228  {
229  ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1;
230  ptrEDMACfg->shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
231  }
232  else
233  {
234  /* Max of 2 CBUFF sessions can be configured*/
235  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
236  }
237 }
238 
255 static int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFHwChannel
256 (
257  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
258  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
259 )
260 {
261  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
262  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
263 
264  if(ptrEDMAInfo->isFirstEDMAChannel)
265  {
266  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel(ptrEDMAInfo, ptrEDMACfg);
267  retVal = 0;
268  }
269  else
270  {
271 
272  /* Sanity Check: Are there sufficient EDMA channels? */
273  if (streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex >= MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL)
274  {
275  /* Error: All the EDMA channels are allocated */
276  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel failed. HW channel index=%d\n",
277  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex);
278  goto exit;
279  }
280 
281  /* Copy over the allocated EDMA configuration. */
282  memcpy ((void *)ptrEDMACfg,
283  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex],
284  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg));
285 
286  /* Increment the allocator index: */
287  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex++;
288 
289  /* EDMA Channel allocated successfully */
290  retVal = 0;
291  }
292 
293 exit:
294  return retVal;
295 }
296 
313 static int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFSwChannel
314 (
315  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
316  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
317 )
318 {
319  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
320  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
321 
322  if(ptrEDMAInfo->isFirstEDMAChannel)
323  {
324  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel(ptrEDMAInfo,ptrEDMACfg);
325  retVal = 0;
326  }
327  else
328  {
329  /* Sanity Check: Are there sufficient EDMA channels? */
330  if (streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex >= MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL)
331  {
332  /* Error: All the EDMA channels are allocated */
333  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel failed. SW channel index=%d\n",
334  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex);
335  goto exit;
336  }
337 
338  /* Copy over the allocated EDMA configuration. */
339  memcpy ((void *)ptrEDMACfg,
340  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelTable[streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex],
341  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg));
342 
343  /* Increment the allocator index: */
344  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex++;
345 
346  /* EDMA Channel allocated successfully */
347  retVal = 0;
348  }
349 
350 exit:
351  return retVal;
352 }
353 
363 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFHwChannel (CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg)
364 {
365  uint8_t index;
366  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
367 
368  if((ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0) ||
369  (ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1))
370  {
371  /*This is the CBUFF trigger channel. It is not part of the resource table so
372  nothing needs to be done*/
373  goto exit;
374  }
375 
376  for (index = 0U; index < MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL; index++)
377  {
378  /* Do we have a match? */
379  if (memcmp ((void*)ptrEDMACfg,
380  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[index],
381  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg)) == 0)
382  {
383  /* Yes: Decrement the HW Session index */
384  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex--;
385  goto exit;
386  }
387  }
388 
389  /* Sanity Check: We should have had a match. An assertion is thrown to indicate that the EDMA channel
390  * being cleaned up does not belong to the table*/
391  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
392 
393 exit:
394  return;
395 }
396 
406 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFSwChannel (CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg)
407 {
408  uint8_t index;
409  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
410 
411  if((ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0) ||
412  (ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1))
413  {
414  /*This is the CBUFF trigger channel. It is not part of the resource table so
415  nothing needs to be done*/
416  goto exit;
417  }
418 
419  for (index = 0U; index < MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL; index++)
420  {
421  /* Do we have a match? */
422  if (memcmp ((void*)ptrEDMACfg,
423  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelTable[index],
424  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg)) == 0)
425  {
426  /* Yes: Decrement the SW Session index */
427  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex--;
428  goto exit;
429  }
430  }
431 
432  /* Sanity Check: We should have had a match. An assertion is thrown to indicate that the EDMA channel
433  * being cleaned up does not belong to the table*/
434  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
435 
436 exit:
437  return;
438 }

440 
450 void MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession (void)
451 {
452  int32_t errCode;
453  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
454 
455  /* Delete session*/
456  if (CBUFF_deleteSession (streamMcb->hwSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
457  {
458  /* Error: Unable to delete the session. */
459  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession CBUFF_deleteSession failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
460  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
461  return;
462  }
463 
464  streamMcb->hwSessionHandle = NULL;
465 
466  /* Did we stream out with the HSI Header? */
467  if (streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated == true)
468  {
469  /* Delete the HSI Header: */
470  if (HSIHeader_deleteHeader (&streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader, &errCode) < 0)
471  {
472  /* Error: Unable to delete the HSI Header */
473  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession HSIHeader_deleteHeader failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
474  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
475  return;
476  }
477 
478  streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated = false;
479  }
480 }
481 
491 void MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession (void)
492 {
493  int32_t errCode;
494  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
495 
496  /* Delete session*/
497  if (CBUFF_deleteSession (streamMcb->swSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
498  {
499  /* Error: Unable to delete the session. */
500  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession CBUFF_deleteSession failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
501  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
502  return;
503  }
504 
505  streamMcb->swSessionHandle = NULL;
506 
507  /* Delete the HSI Header: */
508  if (HSIHeader_deleteHeader (&streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader, &errCode) < 0)
509  {
510  /* Error: Unable to delete the HSI Header */
511  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession HSIHeader_deleteHeader failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
512  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
513  return;
514  }
515 }
516 
529 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_HwTriggerFrameDone (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
530 {
531  int32_t errCode;
532 
533  /* Increment stats*/
534  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneCount++;
535 
536  if(sessionHandle != NULL)
537  {
538  /* There are 2 cases to consider:
539  Only one subframe configured (legacy frame):
540  If there is a software session configured for this subframe, we need to
541  deactivate the HW session here.
542 
543  More than one subframe configured:
544  If there is more than one subframe we need to deactivate the HW
545  session here as other subframes may have configured a HW session.
546  In this case (more than one subframe), the HW session is always created
547  and activated in the application code */
548  if((gMmwMssMCB.objDetCommonCfg.preStartCommonCfg.numSubFrames > 1) ||
549  (gMmwMssMCB.subFrameCfg[0].lvdsStreamCfg.isSwEnabled == 1))
550  {
551  if(CBUFF_deactivateSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
552  {
553  /* Error: Unable to deactivate the session. */
554  DebugP_assert(0);
555  return;
556  }
557  }
558  }
559  else
560  {
561  DebugP_assert(0);
562  }
563 
564  Semaphore_post(gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneSemHandle);
565 }
566 
579 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_SwTriggerFrameDone (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
580 {
581  int32_t errCode;
582 
583  /* Increment stats*/
584  gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneCount++;
585 
586  if(sessionHandle != NULL)
587  {
588  if(CBUFF_deactivateSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
589  {
590  /* Error: Unable to deactivate the session. */
591  DebugP_assert(0);
592  return;
593  }
594 
595  /*If only one subframe has been configured (legacy frame) and
596  a HW session has been configured for that subframe, we need to
597  enable it here as for the legacy frame the HW is NOT reconfigured
598  every frame.
599  If more than one subframe is configured, the HW
600  session is reconfigured and activated every subframe
601  in the application code, not here.*/
602  if((gMmwMssMCB.objDetCommonCfg.preStartCommonCfg.numSubFrames == 1) &&
603  (gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle != NULL))
604  {
605  if(CBUFF_activateSession (gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
606  {
607  DebugP_assert(0);
608  }
609  }
610  }
611  else
612  {
613  DebugP_assert(0);
614  }
615 
616  Semaphore_post(gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneSemHandle);
617 }
618 
630 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamHwConfig (uint8_t subFrameIndx)
631 {
632  CBUFF_SessionCfg sessionCfg;
633  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
634  int32_t errCode;
635  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
636  MmwDemo_SubFrameCfg *subFrameCfg = &gMmwMssMCB.subFrameCfg[subFrameIndx];
637 
638  memset ((void*)&sessionCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_SessionCfg));
639 
640  /* Populate the configuration: */
641  sessionCfg.executionMode = CBUFF_SessionExecuteMode_HW;
642  sessionCfg.edmaHandle = gMmwMssMCB.edmaHandle;
643  sessionCfg.allocateEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFHwChannel;
644  sessionCfg.freeEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFHwChannel;
645  sessionCfg.frameDoneCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_HwTriggerFrameDone;
646  sessionCfg.dataType = CBUFF_DataType_COMPLEX;
647  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataMode = (CBUFF_DataMode)subFrameCfg->adcBufCfg.chInterleave;
648 
649  /* Populate the HW Session configuration: */
650  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.adcBufHandle = gMmwMssMCB.adcBufHandle;
651  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.numADCSamples = subFrameCfg->numAdcSamples;
652  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.numChirpsPerFrame = subFrameCfg->numChirpsPerSubFrame;
653  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.chirpMode = subFrameCfg->adcBufCfg.chirpThreshold;
654  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.opMode = CBUFF_OperationalMode_CHIRP;
655 
656  switch(subFrameCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.dataFmt)
657  {
658  case MMW_DEMO_LVDS_STREAM_CFG_DATAFMT_ADC:
659  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_ADC_DATA;
660  break;
661  case MMW_DEMO_LVDS_STREAM_CFG_DATAFMT_CP_ADC_CQ:
662  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_CP_ADC_CQ;
663  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[0] = 0;
664  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[1] = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(subFrameCfg->sigImgMonTotalSize);
665  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[2] = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(subFrameCfg->satMonTotalSize);
666  break;
667  default:
668  System_printf ("Error: lvdsStreamCfg dataFmt %d is invalid\n", subFrameCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.dataFmt);
669  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
670  break;
671  }
672 
673  if(subFrameCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.isHeaderEnabled)
674  {
675  MmwDemo_debugAssert(streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated == false);
676 
677  /* Create the HSI Header to be used for the HW Session: */
678  if (HSIHeader_createHeader (&sessionCfg, false, &(streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader), &errCode) < 0)
679  {
680  /* Error: Unable to create the HSI Header; report the error */
681  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create HW HSI header with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
682  goto exit;
683  }
684 
685  streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated = true;
686 
687  /* Setup the header in the CBUFF session configuration: */
688  sessionCfg.header.size = HSIHeader_getHeaderSize(&streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader);
689  sessionCfg.header.address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader);
690  }
691 
692  /* Create the HW Session: */
693  streamMcb->hwSessionHandle = CBUFF_createSession (gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle, &sessionCfg, &errCode);
694 
695  if (streamMcb->hwSessionHandle == NULL)
696  {
697  /* Error: Unable to create the CBUFF hardware session */
698  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create the CBUFF hardware session with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
699  goto exit;
700  }
701 
702  /* Control comes here implies that the LVDS Stream has been configured successfully */
703  retVal = 0;
704 
705 exit:
706  return retVal;
707 }
708 
724 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamSwConfig (uint32_t numObjOut,
725  DPIF_PointCloudCartesian *objOut,
726  DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo *objOutSideInfo)
727 {
728  CBUFF_SessionCfg sessionCfg;
729  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream;
730  int32_t errCode;
731  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
732 
733  memset ((void*)&sessionCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_SessionCfg));
734 
735  /* Populate the configuration: */
736  sessionCfg.executionMode = CBUFF_SessionExecuteMode_SW;
737  sessionCfg.edmaHandle = gMmwMssMCB.edmaHandle;
738  sessionCfg.allocateEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFSwChannel;
739  sessionCfg.freeEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFSwChannel;
740  sessionCfg.frameDoneCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_SwTriggerFrameDone;
741  sessionCfg.dataType = CBUFF_DataType_COMPLEX;
742  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[0].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(sizeof(MmwDemo_LVDSUserDataHeader_t));
743  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[0].address = (uint32_t)(streamMcb->userDataHeader);
744 
745  /* Note size and addresses have defaulted to 0 due to memset zero initialization above */
746  if(numObjOut != 0)
747  {
748  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(numObjOut * sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudCartesian));
749  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].address = (uint32_t)objOut;
750 
751  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[2].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(numObjOut * sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo));
752  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[2].address = (uint32_t)objOutSideInfo;
753  }
754 
755  /* Create the HSI Header to be used for the SW Session: */
756  if (HSIHeader_createHeader (&sessionCfg, true, &(streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader), &errCode) < 0)
757  {
758  /* Error: Unable to create the HSI Header; report the error */
759  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create HW HSI header with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
760  goto exit;
761  }
762 
763  /* Setup the header in the CBUFF session configuration: */
764  sessionCfg.header.size = HSIHeader_getHeaderSize(&streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader);
765  sessionCfg.header.address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader);
766 
767  /* Create the SW Session. */
768  streamMcb->swSessionHandle = CBUFF_createSession (gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle, &sessionCfg, &errCode);
769 
770  if (streamMcb->swSessionHandle == NULL)
771  {
772  /* Error: Unable to create the CBUFF SW session */
773  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create the CBUFF SW session with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
774  goto exit;
775  }
776 
777  /* Control comes here implies that the LVDS Stream has been configured successfully */
778  retVal = 0;
779 
780 exit:
781  return retVal;
782 }
783 
794 void MmwDemo_configLVDSHwData(uint8_t subFrameIndx)
795 {
796  int32_t retVal;
797 
798  /* Delete previous CBUFF HW session if one was configured */
799  if(gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle != NULL)
800  {
801  MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession();
802  }
803 
804  /* Configure HW session */
805  if (MmwDemo_LVDSStreamHwConfig(subFrameIndx) < 0)
806  {
807  System_printf("Failed LVDS stream HW configuration\n");
808  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
809  }
810 
811  /* If HW LVDS stream is enabled, start the session here so that ADC samples will be
812  streamed out as soon as the first chirp samples land on ADC*/
813  if(CBUFF_activateSession(gMmwMssMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle, &retVal) < 0)
814  {
815  System_printf("Failed to activate CBUFF session for LVDS stream HW. errCode=%d\n",retVal);
816  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
817  }
818 }
